DEPOSITLIMITS.NAME: Player Deposit Limits
DEPOSITLIMITS.DESCRIPTION: Allow player deposit limits to be specified.

ERRORS.GETLIMITS: Could not retrieve deposit limit information, please try again.

SAVE.ERROR: Deposit limit could not be saved, please try again.

PENDING.DAILY: Daily deposit limit was increased on {{date}} to {{amount}}, this new limit will take effect after 24hours from creation.
PENDING.WEEKLY: Weekly deposit limit was increased on {{date}} to {{amount}}, this new limit will take effect after 24hours from creation.
PENDING.MONTHLY: Monthly deposit limit was increased on {{date}} to {{amount}}, this new limit will take effect after 24hours from creation.

EXPLAIN.SMALLER: This limit change is smaller (or equal) than the current limit, and will take effect immediately.
EXPLAIN.LARGER: This is an increase to this deposit limit, and will only take effect within 24 hours.

3.LABEL: Daily Deposit Limit
3.DESCRIPTION: Set the daily deposit amount for this player

4.LABEL: Weekly Deposit Limit
4.DESCRIPTION: Set the weekly deposit amount for this player

2.LABEL: Monthly Deposit Limit
2.DESCRIPTION: Set the monthly deposit amount for this player

3.LABEL: Current Day Deposits
3.DESCRIPTION: The current deposit amount for this player for the day.

4.LABEL: Current Week Deposits
4.DESCRIPTION: The current deposit amount for this player for the week.

2.LABEL: Current Month Deposits
2.DESCRIPTION: The current deposit amount for this player for the month.
